course.title: Proposal Writing
course.faculty_text: Michaela Gack (Medical School), Galit Alter (Medical School), James A. DeCaprio (Medical School), Benjamin Ellison Gewurz (Medical School), and Frederick C. Wang (Medical School)
course.description: Students will write, present, and evaluate research proposals in the areas of virus replication, viral pathogenesis and treatment and prevention of viral infections.
course.prerequisites: General background in biochemistry and virology.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Medical School as MG 724.0.
